maqras.text: 100|9|Ojo u namedonad, ki dar on ruz on ci dar gurhost, [hama zinda va] ʙarangexta savand
100|10|Va on ci dar sinahost, [hama] oskor gardad
100|11|Jaqinan, dar on ruz Parvardigorason ʙa [vaz'u holi] eson komilan ogoh ast
101|1|[On] Furukuʙanda
101|2|[On] Furukuʙanda cist
101|3|Va tu ci doni, ki [on] furukuʙanda cist
101|4|Ruze, ki mardum monandi parvonahoi parokanda [hajronu sargardon] xohand ʙud
101|5|Va kuhho monandi pasmi rangini hallocisuda (zadasuda) xohand sud
101|6|Va ammo har kase, ki [dar on ruz] pallai mizonas sangin ʙosad
101|7|[Dar ʙihist] Dar zindagii rohatʙaxs xohad ʙud
101|8|Va ammo har kas, ki pallai mizonas saʙuk ʙosad
101|9|Pas, [maskanu] panohgohas «hovija» ast
101|10|Va tu ci doni, ki on [hovija] cist
101|11|Otase ast suzon [va su'lavar]
102|1|Zijodaxohi sumoro ʙa xud masƣul [va az jodi Parvardigor ƣofil] soxt
102|2|To [pojoni] koraton ʙa guriston rasid
102|3|Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo mepindored]; ʙa zudi xohed donist
102|4|Boz [ham] cunin nest; ʙa zudi xohed donist
102|5|Cunin nest [ki sumo gumon mekuned]; agar ʙa donisi jaqini [va tardidnopazir haqiqati qijomatro] medonisted, [az zijodaxohi va iftixor ʙa amvolu farzandonaton dast ʙarmedosted]
102|6|Savgand, ki duzaxro xohed did
102|7|Boz ham savgand, ki onro ʙo casmi jaqin xohed did
102|8|On goh, hatman, dar ruzi qijomat az [tamomi] ne'matho ʙozxost xohed sud
103|1|Savgand ʙa asr
103|2|Ki inson dar zijon ast
103|3|Magar mu'minoni nakukore, ki jakdigarro ʙa haq suporis namudaand va ʙa sikeʙoi tavsija kardaand
104|1|Voj ʙar har ƣajʙatkunanda [va] ajʙcue
104|2|[Hamon] Kase, ki moli farovone gird ovard va onro sumoris kard
104|3|Gumon mekunad, ki molas uro covidona mesozad
104|4|Hargiz cunin nest [ki u gumon mekunad]; hatman, dar otasi darhamkuʙanda andoxta xohad sud
104|5|Va [ej Pajomʙar] tu ci medoni, ki otasi darhamkuʙanda cist
104|6|Otasi ʙarafruxtai ilohi ast
104|7|[Otase] Ki ʙar dilho cira megardad [va mesuzonad]
104|8|Be gumon, on [otas] ʙar onon furuʙasta [va az har su muhosirason karda] ast
104|9|[Afruxta] Dar sutunhoi ʙaland ast
105|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo nadidi Parvardigorat ʙo ashoʙi fil ci kard
105|2|Ojo [fireʙu] naqsai ononro dar taʙohi qaror nadod
105|3|Va parandagone guruh-guruh ʙar [sari] onon firistod
105|4|[Ki] Bo sanggil [ki dar minqoru cangol dostand] ononro sangʙoron mekardand
105|5|Pas, onhoro hamcun kohi cavidasuda soxt
106|1|Baroi [siposguzori az] hamʙastagi va unsi Qurajs
106|2|[Hamon] Hamʙastagi va unsi onon dar safarhoi zimistoni [ʙa Jaman] va toʙistoni [ʙa Som]
106|3|Bojad Parvardigori xonai Ka'ʙaro ʙiparastand
106|4|Hamon [Parvardigore], ki ononro az gurusnagi [rahonid, ʙa eson] xurok dod va az vahsatu tars emin namud
107|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo kase, ki ruzi cazoro duruƣ meangorad, didai
107|2|Pas u [hamon] kasest, ki jatimro [ʙo durusti az xud] meronad
107|3|Va [digaronro] ʙa it'omi tihidast tasviq namekunad
107|4|Pas, voj ʙar namozguzoron
107|5|Hamon kasone, ki az namozason ƣofiland
107|6|Kasone, ki xudnamoi mekunand
107|7|Va [az amonat dodani] vasoili zarurii zindagi dareƣ mevarzand
108|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ba rosti, ki Mo ʙa tu xajri ʙenihojat ato kardem
108|2|Pas, ʙaroi Parvardigorat namoz ʙixon va qurʙoni kun
108|3|Be tardid, dusmanat [az hamai xajrotu ʙarakot ʙeʙahra va] ʙurida ast
109|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ej kofiron
109|2|On ciro sumo meparasted, man nameparastam
109|3|Va on ciro, ki man meparastam, [niz] sumo nameparasted
109|4|Va na man parastisgari on ci sumo parastis kardaed, xoham ʙud
109|5|Va na sumo parastisgari on ci man meparastam, xohed ʙud
109|6|[Binoʙar in] Oini sumo ʙaroi xudaton va oini man ʙaroi xudam»
110|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Hangome ki jorii Alloh taolo va piruzi faro rasad
110|2|Va mardumro ʙuʙini, ki guruh-guruh dar dini Alloh taolo doxil mesavand
110|3|Pas, ʙa citoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh guj va az U omurzis ʙixoh; hamono U ʙisjor tavʙapazir ast
111|1|Burida ʙod har du dasti Aʙulahaʙ va halok ʙod
111|2|Molu sarvatas va on ci ʙa dast ovarda ʙud, ʙa u sude naʙaxsid
111|3|Ba zudi ʙa otasi su'lavar xohad daromad
111|4|Va hamsaras [Ummi Camil, on] hezumkas [niz voridi otas mesavad]
111|5|Bar gardanas tanoʙe az lifi xurmost
112|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «U Alloh taolo jaktost
112|2|Alloh taolo ʙenijoz ast [va hama nijozmandi U hastand]
112|3|Na [farzande] zoda va na zoda sudaast
112|4|Va hec kas hammonandi va hamtoi U naʙuda va nest»
113|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori sapedadam panoh meʙaram
113|2|Az sarri tamomi on ci ofaridaast
113|3|Va az sarri torikii saʙ on goh ki hama coro faro girad
113|4|Va az sar [-i zanoni codugar], ki ʙo afsun dar girehho medamand
113|5|Va az sarri hasud on goh ki hasad varzad»
114|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori mardum panoh meʙaram
114|2|Farmonravoi mardum
114|3|Ma'ʙudi mardum
114|4|Az sarri [sajtoni] vasvasagar, ki [ʙa hangomi zikri Alloh taolo] pinhon megardad
114|5|Hamone, ki dar dilhoi mardum vasvasa mekunad
114|6|Az cinnijon [ʙosad] va [jo az] odamijon»
